languages.text: Whenever the Overseer makes a successful attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free melee attack against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's turn, spending 0 MP) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: While the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}Apprehending{/g} Mastiff is near the Apprehended enemy, it makes a free melee attack against them each time the Overseer hits that enemy. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. If the Apprehended enemy tries to retreat, the Mastiff makes a special melee attack that has a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel their movement.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} атакует это существо, кибермастиф, выполняющий {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}захват{/g}, также атакует его вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Если это существо пытается отойти от кибермастифа, тот может прервать его движение с шансом {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%. Если оно отдалилось от кибермастифа более чем на 1 клетку, тот следует за ним (в ход существа без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}) и атакует его.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} атакует это существо, кибермастиф, выполняющий {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}захват{/g}, также атакует его вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bu yaratığa bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}göz hapsine alan{/g} siber mastif, yaratığa %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapar. Yaratık, siber mastiften uzaklaşmaya kalkarsa siber mastif, %{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} olasılıkla bu yaratığın hareketini iptal edebilir. Yaratık, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu yaratığı takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak) ona saldırır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bu yaratığa başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}göz hapsine alan{/g} siber mastif, yaratığa %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir yakın dövüş saldırısı yapar. Yaratık, siber mastiften uzaklaşmaya kalkarsa siber mastif, %{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} olasılıkla bu yaratığın hareketini iptal edebilir. Yaratık, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu yaratığı takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 HP harcayarak) ona saldırır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bu yaratığa başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}göz hapsine alan{/g} siber mastif, yaratığa %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapar. Yaratık, siber mastiften uzaklaşmaya kalkarsa siber mastif, %{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} olasılıkla bu yaratığın hareketini iptal edebilir. Yaratık, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu yaratığı takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak) ona saldırır.

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} realiza un ataque contra esta criatura, el cibermastín que la tiene {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apresada{/g} efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra ella, infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño. Si esta criatura intenta alejarse del cibermastín, este tiene una probabilidad del {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de anular el movimiento de esta criatura. Si la criatura se aleja más de 1 casilla del cibermastín, este la sigue (durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}) y la ataca.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} realiza un ataque contra esta criatura, el cibermastín que la tiene {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apresada{/g} efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra ella, infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño. Si esta criatura intenta alejarse del cibermastín, este tiene una probabilidad del {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de anular el movimiento de esta criatura. Si la criatura se aleja más de 1 casilla del cibermastín, este la sigue (durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}) y la ataca.

Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} realiza un ataque con éxito contra esta criatura, el cibermastín que la tiene {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apresada{/g} efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra ella, infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño. Si esta criatura intenta alejarse del cibermastín, este tiene una probabilidad del {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de anular el movimiento de esta criatura. Si la criatura se aleja más de 1 casilla del cibermastín, este la sigue (durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}) y la ataca.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}攻击此单位时，{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}实施逮捕{/g}的生化獒犬也会立刻进行一次无消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成的伤害降低50%。如果此单位试图远离生化獒犬，生化獒犬有{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%的几率阻止此单位移动。如果此单位向远处移动，与生化獒犬之间的距离超过1格，生化獒犬会自动跟随此单位（在此单位的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动，不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}），同时进行攻击。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}攻击此单位时，{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}实施逮捕{/g}的生化獒犬也会立刻进行一次无消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成的伤害降低50%。如果此单位试图远离生化獒犬，生化獒犬有{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%的几率阻止此单位移动。如果此单位向远处移动，与生化獒犬之间的距离超过1格，生化獒犬会自动跟随此单位（在此单位的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动，不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}），同时进行攻击。

languages.text: Greift der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} diese Kreatur an, hat der {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}stellende{/g} Cyber-Mastiff einen kostenlosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen diese Kreatur, der −50 % weniger Schaden verursacht. Versucht diese Kreatur, sich vom Cyber-Mastiff zu entfernen, hat dieser eine Chance von {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} %, die Bewegung dieser Kreatur zu unterbinden. Entfernt sich die Kreatur mehr als 1 Feld vom Cyber-Mastiff, folgt ihr dieser (während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} der Kreatur für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}) und attackiert sie.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Greift der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} diese Kreatur an, hat der {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}stellende{/g} Cyber-Mastiff einen kostenlosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen diese Kreatur, der −50 % weniger Schaden verursacht. Versucht diese Kreatur, sich vom Cyber-Mastiff zu entfernen, hat dieser eine Chance von {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} %, die Bewegung dieser Kreatur zu unterbinden. Entfernt sich die Kreatur mehr als 1 Feld vom Cyber-Mastiff, folgt ihr dieser (während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} der Kreatur für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}) und attackiert sie.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} touche cette créature, le cyber-mastiff en mode {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}Appréhension{/g} exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} gratuite lui infligeant 50 % de dégâts en moins. Si la créature tente de s'éloigner du cyber-mastiff, il gagne {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de chances d'annuler son déplacement. Si la créature s'éloigne de plus de 1 case du cyber-mastiff, il la suit immédiatement lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sans dépenser de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et l'attaque.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} touche cette créature, le cyber-mastiff en mode {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}Appréhension{/g} exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} gratuite lui infligeant 50 % de dégâts en moins. Si la créature tente de s'éloigner du cyber-mastiff, il gagne {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de chances d'annuler son déplacement. Si la créature s'éloigne de plus de 1 case du cyber-mastiff, il la suit immédiatement lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sans dépenser de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et l'attaque.

languages.text: この生物に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}が攻撃を成功させると、{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}サイバーマスチフは、生物に対して自由な{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、ダメージは−50%となる。この生物がサイバーマスチフから離れようとすると、サイバーマスチフは{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%の確率でこの生物の移動をキャンセルできる。生物がサイバーマスチフから1セル以上離れて移動すると、サイバーマスチフはそれに付いていき（この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間消費{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は0）、攻撃する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes a successful attack against this creature, the {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If this creature tries to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel this creature's movement. If the creature moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: この生物に対して監督者が攻撃を成功させると、{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}サイバーマスチフは、生物に対して自由な近接攻撃を行い、ダメージは−50%となる。この生物がサイバーマスチフから離れようとすると、サイバーマスチフは{uip|Chance|078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}%の確率でこの生物の移動をキャンセルできる。生物がサイバーマスチフから1セル以上離れて移動すると、サイバーマスチフはそれに付いていき（この生物のターンの間消費MPは0）、攻撃する。

この生物に対して監督者が攻撃を成功させると、{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}サイバーマスチフは、生物に対して自由な近接攻撃を行い、ダメージは−50%となる。この生物がサイバーマスチフから離れようとすると、サイバーマスチフは{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%の確率でこの生物の移動をキャンセルできる。生物がサイバーマスチフから1セル以上離れて移動すると、サイバーマスチフはそれに付いていき（この生物のターンの間消費MPは0）、攻撃する。
